content:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Honda’s Prelude is back after 25 years as a 200-horsepower hybrid.
• It’s a tech-loaded, front-wheel-drive coupe that shits all over boring-ass crossovers.
• Japan pricing starts at $41,600; US release is coming, but no date yet.

Impact — Honda’s Prelude revival is a ballsy move to reignite the sporty coupe flame in a world drowning in SUVs.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.theverge.com/news/772274/honda-prelude-fake-shifting-sound-hyrbid
